TopicTitle: Suggestion: Remove Fuel tanks in PAM and if you right click a fuel tank open Resource Manager

Articles.Content:
Fuel tanks have no valid reason to be in PAM as they don't provide any information and it is just wasted space there, at least inflight. In VAB you can show them there as you can set the fuel level.

I am so confused if i right click a fuel tank in flight and wonder why there is no information. And always have to remind myself that there is a hidden Resource Manager.
I wholeheartedly agree with this suggestion, the Resource Manager is too hidden right now.
It may be there because a feature is lacking right now and it will be useful in future updates.

I agree! Honestly, PAM is in need of a cleanup in general. ANYTHING that has no actual use in the PAM shouldn't be clogging up space, because as it stands right now the system is very cluttered with unhelpful things
